Package org.apache.beam.runners.flink.translation.functions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FlinkAssignWindows<T,W extends BoundedWindow>
    Flink FlatMapFunction for implementing Window.Bound.
    FlinkDoFnFunction<InputT,OutputT>
    Encapsulates a DoFn inside a Flink RichMapPartitionFunction.
    FlinkMergingNonShuffleReduceFunction<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT,W extends IntervalWindow>
    Special version of FlinkReduceFunction that supports merging windows.
    FlinkMergingPartialReduceFunction<K,InputT,AccumT,W extends IntervalWindow>
    Special version of FlinkPartialReduceFunction that supports merging windows.
    FlinkMergingReduceFunction<K,AccumT,OutputT,W extends IntervalWindow>
    Special version of FlinkReduceFunction that supports merging windows.
    FlinkMultiOutputDoFnFunction<InputT,OutputT>
    Encapsulates a DoFn that uses side outputs inside a Flink RichMapPartitionFunction.
    FlinkMultiOutputPruningFunction<T>
    A FlatMapFunction function that filters out those elements that don't belong in this output.
    FlinkPartialReduceFunction<K,InputT,AccumT,W extends BoundedWindow>
    This is is the first step for executing a Combine.PerKey on Flink.
    FlinkReduceFunction<K,AccumT,OutputT,W extends BoundedWindow>
    This is the second part for executing a Combine.PerKey on Flink, the second part is FlinkReduceFunction.
    SideInputInitializer<ElemT,ViewT,W extends BoundedWindow>
    BroadcastVariableInitializer that initializes the broadcast input as a Map from window to side input.
